ygData.subject: RE: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: I sell mine to people for 250 pp and most are more than happy to purchase them at this price. The people that I get the most arguement from are the under Level
ygData.messageBody:
I sell mine to people for 250 pp and most are more than happy to purchase
them at this price.

The people that I get the most arguement from are the under Level 20 crowd
who completes the quest and gets the staff and then wants the bow for
nothing (see one of my earlier posts on how I dealt with one young punk).

I am now "cranking out" Darkwood Bows and selling them at a very good price.
What prices do you charge for other bows?

My pricing is this way

5pp for Elm (13 75 51)
25pp for Ash (16 100 58 or 15 100 54)
175pp for Oak (17 125 48)
600pp for Darkwood (20 150 46)

I don't even bother making anyother bows, and I don't sell arrows at all to
the public as the "space to profit" ratio is bad.

Vpan (so close to 200 I can taste it) Master Fletcher, Povar
